attributes.action: Remove Patricia Hewitt from the office of Health Secretary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Common consensus among frontline healthcare staff suggests Patricia Hewitt is the worst health minister in living memory. She has lost the confidence of NHS staff on the shop floor and seems to have no idea about what is going on (2006 being "the best year ever" for the NHS)! Her reforms have been draconian and NHS morale is at rock bottom because of them
